class Mithun:
    def __init__(self):
        self.name = "Mithun"
        self.location = "Bangalore, India ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³"
        self.role = "AI/ML Enthusiast & Full Stack Developer"
        self.education = "Computer Science Student"
        self.interests = ["Artificial Intelligence", "Machine Learning",
                         "Web Development", "Open Source"]

    def say_hi(self):

me = Mithun()
me.say_hi()
